Text:
Downloaded it.. works fine..
But i've only shot 1 deer in 2 hours -.-
It's like just walking around for hours and shoot 1 mob..
No instructions what to do etc..
not the best first impression hehe
God I'm retarded. Spent like an hour hunting in the starting area and couldn't find a damn thing. I didn't get that you had to enter the car to get to the hunting areas.
